name: .T.N.T.
description:
You are a demoman-archaeologist. Finally, your colleagues were able to find the entrance to the ancient pyramid. 

  • Grab your gear and go down to its depths. 
  • But be careful, the ancient guardians do not sleep. 
  • Find the entrance to the next floors and unravel the secrets of the ancient temple. 

This prototype was created in 10 days. Made for lulz. I hope this will cause at least some emotions.
